page.title: 15POPULAR GAMES AT OAKE SCHOOL
page.content: THERE ARE THIRTY-SIX CHILDREN AT OAKE. THEY GO TO PLAY IN THE FARMER'S FIELD OVER THE ROAD. THE MOST POPULAR GAME IS FOOTBALL. IT IS MOSTLY BOYS WHO LIKE FOOTBALL. THE RULES ARE:- YOU HAVE ONE GOAL AT EACH END OF THE PITCH, AND ELEVEN PEOPLE IN EACH TEAM, SIX CENTRES, TWO ATTACKERS, TWO DEFENDERS AND ONE GOAL KEEPER. THE IDEA IS:- THE TOP END HAS TO TAKE THE BALL DOWN TO THE BOTTOM END AND GET PAST THE GOALKEEPER TO SCORE A GOAL. THE TEAM WITH THE MOST GOALS WINS. ANOTHER GAME THEY LIKE TO PLAY IS BRITISH BULLDOG. ONE PERSON IS "ON IT". IF THAT PERSON SAYS "FREE PASSAGE" YOU MAY GO PAST WITHOUT BEING CAUGHT. IF THE PERSON SAYS "BRITISH BULLDOG" YOU HAVE GOT TO RUN IN FRONT OF HIM OR HER WITHOUT BEING CAUGHT. THE LAST PERSON TO BE CAUGHT IS "ON IT".
